name: df-unop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cuo, cab(s0, wa(wfo(cv(s0), chba, chba), wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csp, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the set of unitary operators on Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
